By sticking to choice_1, I guarantee myself rewards of 3, 4 or 5 depending on what you do. Whereas if I commit to going along with your plan and you change your mind, I could get stuck with rewards as low as 1 or 2. That's too much risk for me.

- If Alice first chooses choice_2, and I then choose choice_1, Alice will subsequently choose choice_2 to maximize her reward (4 instead of 1). This results in me receiving a reward of 10, which is the maximum reward I can get in any scenario.
- Choosing choice_2 in any situation leads to lower rewards for me. If Alice chooses choice_1 or choice_2, and I choose choice_2, my maximum possible reward is only 5.
